channel.title: Season of Dreams - April 3 Shot
channel.description:
**Season of Dreams** : This is a game involving magic, mystery and monsters. We will be playing in the default setting for Earth: Salisbury, in southern England, and we will begin play in 2010. Play will slip back and forth between Salisbury and the Gloom.
* Powered by the Apocalypse. * The game will be recorded on Youtube. * THE X-CARD will also be in use. * Will be multiple sessions, will try to weave in ongoing/non-ongoing stories in fun ways.
1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MSWfO1yckI5u_P9Nffm 2 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MSWfdVGOGeGJz6fsLU7 3 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MSYrGkm1lATXXnAFnuE
**Playbooks** - https://drive.google.com/file/d/12CATK_RGiTg8Ax-A7SwdLc7dX8UWb8ty/view?usp=sharing
**Playsheet** - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LAp3eJdM7-42aYg0SjxPDvXzcVP-95pZ/view?usp=sharing

item.title: Season of Dreams - April 3 Shot
item.dc:creator: @BlakeRyan
item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

Season of Dreams : This is a game involving magic, mystery and monsters. We will be playing in the default setting for Earth: Salisbury, in southern England, and we will begin play in 2010. Play will slip back and forth between Salisbury and the Gloom.

  • Powered by the Apocalypse.
  • The game will be recorded on Youtube.
  • THE X-CARD will also be in use.
  • Will be multiple sessions, will try to weave in ongoing/non-ongoing stories in fun ways.
